listitem.para: Install the packages:apt-get install -y openvswitch-switchyum install -y openvswitch-switch
Start Open vSwitch serviceservice openvswitch-switch startservice openvswitch-switch start chkconfig openvswitch-switch on
Install the packages:apt-get install -y quantum-plugin-openvswitch-agentyum install -y openstack-quantum-openvswitch

Edit /etc/quantum/quantum.conf file and modify: core_plugin = \ quantum.plugins.openvswitch.ovs_quantum_plugin.OVSQuantumPluginV2 auth_strategy = keystone
fake_rabbit = False rabbit_host = 192.168.0.1 rabbit_password = passwordrpc_backend=quantum.openstack.common.rpc.impl_qpid

Edit /etc/quantum/plugins/openvswitch/ovs_quantum_plugin.ini file and modify:[DATABASE] sql_connection = mysql://quantum:password@192.168.0.1:3306/quantum [OVS] tenant_network_type = gre tunnel_id_ranges = 1:1000 integration_bridge = br-int tunnel_bridge = br-tun local_ip = 10.10.10.2 enable_tunneling = Trueln -s /etc/quantum/plugins/openvswitch/ovs_quantum_plugin.ini /etc/quantum/plugin.ini
Start the Agent:service quantum-plugin-openvswitch-agent restartservice quantum-openvswitch-agent restart chkconfig quantum-openvswitch-agent on
Ensure the cleanup utility is started on future boots:
